feature_data.name: Memory Snapshot Service
feature_data.description: Git-based system state persistence for DevOps-style restoration

feature_data.name: DGX Readiness Preparation Expedition

scenarios.name: Review DGX Documentation
steps: Given DGX documentation is available
When we analyze all DGX specifications and capabilities
Then we should identify key research opportunities
And determine optimal configuration for NuSy workloads
And create comprehensive readiness checklist

scenarios.name: Sub-Expedition Planning
steps: Given DGX capabilities are understood
When we assess current infrastructure gaps
Then we should identify required sub-expeditions
And prioritize preparation activities
And assign tasks to appropriate team members

scenarios.name: Environment Preparation
steps: Given sub-expeditions are identified
When we execute preparation activities
Then DGX environment should be ready
And integration with existing systems should be complete
And performance benchmarks should be established

scenarios.name: Research Planning
steps: Given DGX is ready for operation
When we plan initial research activities
Then we should have prioritized research roadmap
And resource allocation should be optimized
And success metrics should be defined

feature_data.content:
Feature: DGX Readiness Preparation Expedition
  As a NuSy development team
  We need to prepare for DGX arrival
  So that we can maximize utilization and research capabilities

  Background:
    Given the DGX has been ordered
    And we have November 18, 2025 as current date
    And we need to be maximally prepared

  Scenario: Review DGX Documentation
    Given DGX documentation is available
    When we analyze all DGX specifications and capabilities
    Then we should identify key research opportunities
    And determine optimal configuration for NuSy workloads
    And create comprehensive readiness checklist

  Scenario: Sub-Expedition Planning
    Given DGX capabilities are understood
    When we assess current infrastructure gaps
    Then we should identify required sub-expeditions
    And prioritize preparation activities
    And assign tasks to appropriate team members

  Scenario: Environment Preparation
    Given sub-expeditions are identified
    When we execute preparation activities
    Then DGX environment should be ready
    And integration with existing systems should be complete
    And performance benchmarks should be established

  Scenario: Research Planning
    Given DGX is ready for operation
    When we plan initial research activities
    Then we should have prioritized research roadmap
    And resource allocation should be optimized
    And success metrics should be defined

feature_data.name: DGX Infrastructure Setup

scenarios.name: Power Infrastructure Assessment
steps: Given DGX requires 6.5kW maximum power consumption
When we assess current power infrastructure
Then we should identify upgrade requirements
And create procurement plan for additional capacity
And establish power redundancy measures

scenarios.name: Cooling System Verification
steps: Given DGX supports liquid cooling
When we evaluate current cooling systems
Then we should verify capacity for 6.5kW thermal load
And plan liquid cooling infrastructure if needed
And establish temperature monitoring systems

scenarios.name: Network Infrastructure Upgrade
steps: Given DGX requires 100GbE networking
When we assess current network infrastructure
Then we should identify bandwidth and latency requirements
And plan network topology upgrades
And establish RDMA-capable networking

scenarios.name: Physical Installation Planning
steps: Given DGX is 6U rack server form factor
When we plan the physical installation
Then we should select appropriate rack location
And plan cable management and airflow
And establish maintenance access procedures

feature_data.content:
Feature: DGX Infrastructure Setup
  As a systems engineer
  We need to prepare the physical infrastructure for DGX arrival
  So that the hardware can be safely installed and operated

  Background:
    Given DGX readiness expedition identified infrastructure gaps
    And we have 2 weeks to complete infrastructure preparation
    And power/cooling/networking requirements are known

  @critical @infrastructure
  Scenario: Power Infrastructure Assessment
    Given DGX requires 6.5kW maximum power consumption
    When we assess current power infrastructure
    Then we should identify upgrade requirements
    And create procurement plan for additional capacity
    And establish power redundancy measures

  @critical @infrastructure
  Scenario: Cooling System Verification
    Given DGX supports liquid cooling
    When we evaluate current cooling systems
    Then we should verify capacity for 6.5kW thermal load
    And plan liquid cooling infrastructure if needed
    And establish temperature monitoring systems

  @critical @infrastructure
  Scenario: Network Infrastructure Upgrade
    Given DGX requires 100GbE networking
    When we assess current network infrastructure
    Then we should identify bandwidth and latency requirements
    And plan network topology upgrades
    And establish RDMA-capable networking

  @high @infrastructure
  Scenario: Physical Installation Planning
    Given DGX is 6U rack server form factor
    When we plan the physical installation
    Then we should select appropriate rack location
    And plan cable management and airflow
    And establish maintenance access procedures

feature_data.name: Software Stack Preparation

scenarios.name: CUDA Ecosystem Optimization
steps: Given DGX uses NVIDIA A100/H100 GPUs
When we set up CUDA development environment
Then we should install optimized CUDA 12.0+
And configure cuDNN for maximum performance
And establish GPU driver compatibility

scenarios.name: Multi-GPU Communication Setup
steps: Given DGX has 8 GPUs requiring efficient communication
When we configure NCCL for distributed training
Then we should optimize collective communication
And establish RDMA-capable interconnects
And benchmark communication performance

scenarios.name: Container Orchestration Setup
steps: Given distributed workloads require containerization
When we set up Kubernetes with GPU support
Then we should configure GPU resource management
And establish container registry integration
And create base container images

scenarios.name: Development Environment Configuration
steps: Given multiple teams need development access
When we configure development environments
Then we should set up JupyterHub with GPU access
And establish code synchronization tools
And create development workflow templates

feature_data.content:
Feature: Software Stack Preparation
  As a ML engineer
  We need to prepare the software environment for DGX operation
  So that we can efficiently utilize the hardware capabilities

  Background:
    Given DGX readiness expedition identified software requirements
    And we have 3 weeks to complete software preparation
    And CUDA/cuDNN/NCCL optimization is critical

  @critical @software
  Scenario: CUDA Ecosystem Optimization
    Given DGX uses NVIDIA A100/H100 GPUs
    When we set up CUDA development environment
    Then we should install optimized CUDA 12.0+
    And configure cuDNN for maximum performance
    And establish GPU driver compatibility

  @critical @software
  Scenario: Multi-GPU Communication Setup
    Given DGX has 8 GPUs requiring efficient communication
    When we configure NCCL for distributed training
    Then we should optimize collective communication
    And establish RDMA-capable interconnects
    And benchmark communication performance

  @high @software
  Scenario: Container Orchestration Setup
    Given distributed workloads require containerization
    When we set up Kubernetes with GPU support
    Then we should configure GPU resource management
    And establish container registry integration
    And create base container images

  @high @software
  Scenario: Development Environment Configuration
    Given multiple teams need development access
    When we configure development environments
    Then we should set up JupyterHub with GPU access
    And establish code synchronization tools
    And create development workflow templates

feature_data.name: Autonomous Development Enhancement

scenarios.name: Performance Monitoring Implementation
steps: Given autonomous system is running
When we implement performance monitoring
Then system metrics should be collected
And performance bottlenecks should be identified
And optimization recommendations should be generated

scenarios.name: Multi-Agent Coordination
steps: Given multiple autonomous agents exist
When we implement coordination mechanisms
Then agents should communicate effectively
And work should be distributed optimally
And conflicts should be resolved automatically

scenarios.name: External Integration Expansion
steps: Given system works with internal components
When we add external integrations
Then GitHub issues should be processed
And external APIs should be accessible
And third-party tools should be integrated

scenarios.name: Advanced Task Planning
steps: Given current planning is basic
When we implement advanced planning
Then complex multi-step tasks should be decomposed
And dependencies should be automatically identified
And optimal execution order should be determined

scenarios.name: Self-Improvement Capabilities
steps: Given system can execute tasks
When we add self-improvement features
Then code quality should be automatically improved
And performance should be continuously optimized
And new capabilities should be autonomously developed

feature_data.content:
Feature: Autonomous Development Enhancement
  As a development team
  We need to enhance the autonomous development system
  So that it can work more efficiently and take on complex tasks

  Background:
    Given Santiago-Dev autonomous system is operational
    And DGX readiness work is complete
    And continuous improvement is needed

  @high @enhancement
  Scenario: Performance Monitoring Implementation
    Given autonomous system is running
    When we implement performance monitoring
    Then system metrics should be collected
    And performance bottlenecks should be identified
    And optimization recommendations should be generated

  @high @enhancement
  Scenario: Multi-Agent Coordination
    Given multiple autonomous agents exist
    When we implement coordination mechanisms
    Then agents should communicate effectively
    And work should be distributed optimally
    And conflicts should be resolved automatically

  @medium @enhancement
  Scenario: External Integration Expansion
    Given system works with internal components
    When we add external integrations
    Then GitHub issues should be processed
    And external APIs should be accessible
    And third-party tools should be integrated

  @medium @enhancement
  Scenario: Advanced Task Planning
    Given current planning is basic
    When we implement advanced planning
    Then complex multi-step tasks should be decomposed
    And dependencies should be automatically identified
    And optimal execution order should be determined

  @low @enhancement
  Scenario: Self-Improvement Capabilities
    Given system can execute tasks
    When we add self-improvement features
    Then code quality should be automatically improved
    And performance should be continuously optimized
    And new capabilities should be autonomously developed
